mapper.select: SELECT year, month_list FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT DATE_FORMAT(created_date, '%Y') AS year, DATE_FORMAT(created_date, '%m') AS month_list FROM ACCOUNTING WHERE status = 'ACTIVE' ) AS subquery ORDER BY year DESC, month_list DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNTING SET spending = #{expense}, user_id = #{user.id}, bill = #{bill}, title = #{title}, note = #{note} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT spending, remain, id FROM ACCOUNTING WHERE created_date >= #{createdDate} AND created_date <= CONCAT(LAST_DAY(#{createdDate}), ' 23:59:59') AND status ='ACTIVE' ORDER BY created_date ASC

SELECT spending, remain FROM ACCOUNTING WHERE created_date < #{createdDate} AND created_date >= DATE_FORMAT(#{createdDate}, '%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') AND created_date <= CONCAT(LAST_DAY(#{createdDate}), ' 23:59:59') AND status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY created_date DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT remain FROM ACCOUNTING WHERE created_date <= #{endDate} AND status ='ACTIVE' ORDER BY created_date DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT a.*, u.fullname FROM ACCOUNTING a INNER JOIN USER u on a.user_id = u.id WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.status ='ACTIVE'
